des: "Looking for a breakfast shake with the great benefits of oats? Try the Carnation Breakfast EssentialsÂ® Chocolate Oatmeal Shake. This reader-submitted recipe is a satisfying and nutritious start to your day."
ins:
Combine oats and water in a microwaveable bowl; microwave on high for 1 1/2-2 minutes. Stir and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
Place milk, Carnation Breakfast Essentials(R) powder drink mix, cooled oats and ice in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Pour in a tall glass and enjoy!
